Many professional photographers want no more zoom power than is required for a portrait lens that can keep a respectabile distance from its subject.A wide-angle has more uses for me than a zoom, enabling me to capture a larger field of action as well as to take advantage of its superior depth of field.  If I were moving upward in the Elph line, it would be to a camera with a slightly wider-angle lens (24mm is better than 28mm) and slighly wider aperture (the SD-4000, with a f2/0 setting was the Elph champ at available light shots).  But the Elph 100 carries the HS suffix, reassuring the user of its superior capabilities at capturing available-light and even night shots without flash.[Although Amzon's prices are the usually the lowest among internet stores and, especially with Prime, come with the least hassle at the ordering and, if necessary, return stage, some times you'll be surprised at the specials to be found at the manufacturer's main consumer site.  In fact, I recently saw this camera going for half the price on the Canon site (and there's no need to be cautious about "refurbs" from the manufacturer, which have always be inseparable from new to my eyes and come with the identical warranty.]

Reviews.Title: MY LITTLE ELPH POWERSHOT
Reviews.Author: Linda M. Littlefield
Reviews.Content: WONDERFUL LITTLE CAMERA. MY FAVORITE FEATURE IS THE ZOOM. I LOVE TAKING NATURE PHOTOS AND THE ZOOM IS ESSENTIAL, BUT I NEED A SMALL SIZE. THIS IS THE ONE FOR ME.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids that can take care of stuff
Reviews.Author: Deej
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's seventh birthday because she's pretty good about taking care of her things and I was tired of the grainy, crappy photos off her toy cameras.  A year and a half later this thing is still going strong in her hands and I couldn't be happier with it!  She loves it, and it takes really good pictures for a small camera, it's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Lighting issues
Reviews.Author: nancy wolford
Reviews.Content: My wife used this camera for about two years.  The complaint she had was that you never knew if the pictures were going to be too dark.  Sometimes they turned out beautifully.  Other times, they were just too dark to see.  She recently bought a larger camera.

Reviews.Title: Great for 2nd digital camera.
Reviews.Author: Rick26 "Rick26"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera as a backup to our full-size Canon Rebel DSLR.  We keep it in the car and have it on hand for quick "grab-and-shoot" photo ops (and, when we don't have access to the bigger camera.)The photos we've taken have all been good, high-quality shots and haven't been disappointed with any aspect of this camera.  Keep in mind, since this is not our main unit, we haven't tried to use all of the settings, features and abilities of the ELPH 100 HS.  However, I don't have any doubt that it would perform well for anyone using this as their only camera.One of the main features I like is that this small, pocket-size camera uses a full-size SD card, unlike many other cameras of this size that only have a mini-SD.  It's just so much more convenient to handle and swap into computers, photo processing kiosks, etc. (and, one of the features that I looked for when originally purchasing this camera).Bottom line, YES, we'd buy another one.

Reviews.Title: don't like this camera
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: I really dislike this camera. I bought it to replace a very old point and shoot canon that took wonderful photos. in other words, my expectations for a point and shoot camera are very reasonable. this camera is horrible whether you use the fully automatic settings or manually set everything. in a group setting of a dozen or so cameras, mine always takes the worst photos. every smart phone I've seen takes a better photo than this camera. Even professional photographers can't get a good shot from my camera. These are basic snapshots, nothing fancy.  It just doesn't take good photos. if your camera can't accurately capture a photo of a sleeping house cat, it is a BAD camera. it was a waste of money, I will be shopping for a new camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: M. Husted
Reviews.Content: Good feel to the camera, perfect for a less serious hobbiest but fine for someone looking to capture more artistic shots.

Reviews.Title: You Get a lot for your money with the Canon ELPH 100HS
Reviews.Author: D. Musicant "Muse"
Reviews.Content: Big 3" LCD, amazing battery life (I don't recall having a battery run down on me yet, but just in case I do have a backup battery with me), takes great pictures. I have less problems getting great looking pictures than with my DSLR. I usually use the automatic settings, but not always. So compact, I can take it with me anywhere, and whenever I think of it and think I might run into something I'd like a picture of I toss it in my backpack or pants' pocket. My last compact digicam's battery was always dieing, often unexpectedly after just a few pictures. This camera is far lighter and smaller, has a much bigger LCD and the battery has never died. Add to that the HD video (which I've used not a few times), and the slow motion video (this is a really useful feature for me!), and I have to say, I couldn't be more pleased. This also cost me about half my last compact digicam!

Reviews.Title: Good little camera
Reviews.Author: Bodacious Baker
Reviews.Content: My husband got me this camera for a Christmas present last year; it's a good little camera for the price and It takes good pictures!  I like to food blog occasionally and it's taken some nice pictures.  Over all I'm happy with this camera, it does what it's supposed to and was affordable.  If I had to make suggestions on this camera I would say the only two negatives are:  If you use the video recorder it tends to wear the battery down fast and you'll have to charge it often.  I'd also suggest slightly raising the button that snaps a picture since I have often pushed the on/off button by mistake since they are side by side but it's not a deal breaker; I like the camera for the money!

Reviews.Title: video time length limitation
Reviews.Author: MikoR "MikoR"
Reviews.Content: do not buy this camera. cannon purposely disabled videos from being longer then 10 minutes to force people to buy separate digital video cameras. otherwise it takes great pictures but i was looking forward to taking videos longer then 10 minutes!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Michelle S
Reviews.Content: I use this camera to take about 200 pictures a day (I sell online).  It's easy to use, and does nice quality pictures.  I like the ease of use and big screen on the back.  Great video too.

Reviews.Title: Not good for my needs
Reviews.Author: Islander
Reviews.Content: This is good for outdoor when the sun is out. Poor image quality otherwise, especially indoors with dim lighting. The video quality is not that good either.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect! :)
Reviews.Author: Shannon Patton
Reviews.Content: Definitely love my new camera. When I bought it I was going for the exact same camera I previously had, instead it was purple not blue, I found this one and new it was a keeper! Thank you for your reduction and services!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: David A. Hall
Reviews.Content: My first digital. Easy to use, sharp pictures,much easier to carry around than my old 35mm.  clear instructions. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: I'll buy another Canon when I am done with this one.
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I've had a bunch of digital cameras.  The one prior to this one was a Nikon with all the gadgetry and the lighting on photos was horrible.  In contrast, this Canon, points and shoots without delays.  The photo quality is good.  The software is also very compatible with what I already had on my computer and easy to use.  I haven't said this about any of the last cameras I've had, but I WILL buy another Canon when I am done with this one.

Reviews.Title: moving target issue
Reviews.Author: Jorge Urdaneta
Reviews.Content: it is a pain to get a clear photo of my kid. this camera makes difficult to capture moving targets

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
Reviews.Author: tiffany
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I've aways wanted a camera and finally had the money to get one. I didn't want a fancy one that pro photograghers use. But Im very happy with this. Battery life is amazing and lets face it Pink is the best color :) The color doesnt chip off at all and the picture quality is great. Im happy I bought this and reccomend it.

Reviews.Title: Very slow camera
Reviews.Author: Gabi "Groverkitty"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very very slow. We bought it to take pics of our lil one and as you know, babies and kids don't ever sit still. It takes forever to take a picture! Very frustrating. It works well to take pics of nature, or inanimate objects, and the pics have always turned out very pretty. My only gripe is the speed.

Reviews.Title: These cameras are JUNK! STAY AWAY!
Reviews.Author: AircraftNut
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these about two years ago and it worked great until one day the lens extended and would not retract. I got some "lens error" message and the camera would no longer work. I bought a second one (used) through e-bay and within a few months, I got the IDENTICAL problem. The lens stuck out and would not retract.I contacted Canon about the problem and they want me to send them in for servicing at a fixed service charge of $129 (Canadian) plus shipping and taxes - total $159 PER CAMERA!  (I paid about $240 (Canadian) for the first one. I realized I could get a used one for a lot less than their repair cost, so got the second for about $90).I figured the odds of my getting two that failed in the identical manner would be extremely high unless there was some sort of design defect or manufacturing problem. Looking on Google, I found there are several cameras by CANON which have the identical problem!  I've had lots of their old 35mm SLR equipment which was outstanding, but their digital cameras are just overpriced junk in comparison.DO NOT GO NEAR THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: great starter camera
Reviews.Author: jeane ley "the oblate"
Reviews.Content: I keep this small camera with me so I can catch weather photos or something in the garden. It has taken hundreds of photos at concerts, museums, and at family gatherings.It is small, light weight, fits in pocket or purse and is super easy to use.It is not a professional camera but I have had many photos win a slot on TV or sold photos at art fairs.The best part it is a great camera to start a student with that likes photos they can easily upload to computers and make videos from. It does short recordings that are clear.Just a nice all round starter camera with the same good qualityI expect in all my Canon products and cameras.I would make this a great gift for older people as it is so easy to handle.I have trouble holding the large heavier cameras and this is easy to use and hold.

Reviews.Title: awesome casual use camera, but charging is a hassle.
Reviews.Author: eam1188
Reviews.Content: the camera itself is very nice for casual use and very light. although i wish the battery life was a bit better.not to mention the battery needs to be taken out of the camera and placed into the charging station, WHICH hooks up to the wall taking up about 2 electrical sockets.

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures and convenient
Reviews.Author: Ben Schmittdiel
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures.  I have a larger camera and sometimes I want something smaller to stick in my purse for everyday use- This camera has worked out great.

Reviews.Title: Lens Problems Here Too
Reviews.Author: NO
Reviews.Content: Lasted one year. Then lens would not operate properly.  They give you a one year wty, and it dies 13 months later.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use, has a lot of special features, an awesome zoom and just the right size. It take better pictures than my iphone! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: hobbiest
Reviews.Content: Never thought a point and shoot would work this good for this money. Outstanding, pics without the flash are very true to the colors and works in low light better than I expected.  Good Value. 'nuff said

Reviews.Title: failed after just 18 mos
Reviews.Author: T. Dugan
Reviews.Content: Lens refuses to close after just 18 mos.  Lots of reports of this on the web.  Canon's customer service offer is for a credit to buy a refub, but still at a high price.  This is/was last canon product for me....

Reviews.Title: Didn't last
Reviews.Author: D. B.
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about cameras, but we do try to take good care of our cameras.  This is our third Canon that hasn't made it to its 2nd birthday.  The first one would get purple lines across the screen while using the video function.  The 2nd camera won't take a photo on about half of the settings but will on the other half.  This one says "locked memory card" on the screen, even with memory cards that work fine in other cameras.  We've googled it and it seems this is a common error, but it's not under warranty so...  Next step is to see if someone will repair it for a few dollars (it seems like it should be an easy fix), or, buy a new camera- hooray :-/  (it probably won't be a canon.  if it is, we'll invest in the extended warranty.)

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: lineman
Reviews.Content: The Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS camera worked flawlessly for me on my fishing trip. The compact size is a big plus, easy to carry in the inside pocket of my chest waders. Had the camera set on the auto function for all of my over 300 pictures. It took beautiful pictures of the Rocky Mountains even out of a moving vehicle at highway speeds. I would recommend this nice little camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: pacecar21
Reviews.Content: I had a nikkon, it was a pretty good camera... then i used my friends cannon powershot elph 100. I was in love with this camera!!! So i bought one for myself! it's a perfect camera even if you aren't a professional photographer, i just like to capture moments! this thing goes with me everywhere!! I stick it in my purse, in my pocket, wherever! it's nice and light, I don't think it's ever taken a bad picture, So worth every penny!!! The pictures are clear, there are many different settings to take pictures, even in the high speed burst setting the pictures are clear and you get great action shots! the low light setting is also amazing!! who knew you could take good pictures in the dark?!? i even loved it so much i bought the waterproof version!!

Reviews.Title: This camera is so easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Bird Lover
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I broke my first Canon PowerShot.  I looked on Amazon and found the exact same one.  I was SO relieved!  The battery is long lasting and the camera takes beautifully clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Selfox
Reviews.Content: Cool camera, love especially the movie digest function, keeps the photos and get a cool video after a day taking shots.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: nascargma48
Reviews.Content: happy to be able to replace my camera without out having to buy a new model, seeing I have all the underwater kit for this one...thank you for your excellent delivery

Reviews.Title: Smile for the Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Cornejo
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for a handheld camera special for fast trips or work. Nice picture frame and quality also very good battery life

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Valentina Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Is a good camera, all the tiem, we used. The color is the best. Nosotros la recomendamos, es muy rapida

Reviews.Title: 1080pHD images with phenomenal picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Dotan Baer "Ranger Recon"
Reviews.Content: title says it all this camera is hands down the BEST purchase we have made.  Neither of our cell phones can take pictures this well and now having our son we want all the photos we can get without worry about poor quality.  This and Walmart picture printing go hand in hand.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: beaker
Reviews.Content: I've been using this for a while, and haven't had any problems. Great quality pictures. I always have it strapped to my hiking pack, and have come back with some great shots.

Reviews.Title: Just bought my second one.  Pretty perfect camera.
Reviews.Author: WMF "Wanderer"
Reviews.Content: I bought my first one of these in 2006 and have taken thousands and thousands of pics with it.  It went with me all over Europe and all over the country and never let me down, and frequently amazed me.  It's small, easy to use, and takes great pics.  It even takes good video and has great sound.  After 7 years I finally dropped it about 5 times in a week and cracked the screen on the back.  Even though it still works, I couldn't see what I was shooting so I ordered another one.  It was worth what I paid in 2006 - about 250.00 - and is more than worth the 127.00 I just paid for this one.  I love Canon's PowerShot Elph series and also have a SX 260HS and highly recommend it as well.  Oh yeah, the batteries rock, too.  I get easily 500-700 pics per charge on the little 100HS with approx. 50-70 shots using the flash.  Can't beat these cameras.  Buy one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!
Reviews.Author: Songbird654
Reviews.Content: I love how easy it is to use this camera, and it takes great pictures! For the best quality in pictures, the button for taking a picture will be held down half-way for the camera to focus and then pushed down the rest of the way to take the picture. Zooming in and out is a breeze, making it easy to take the perfect picture quickly. Additionally, I love how compact the camera is! Perfect size, and I love the color too! I would say 99% of the time I'm able to leave the camera in auto mode, and it does what it needs to take a great picture (flash/no flash, etc.). Maybe 1% of the time I will end up changing the mode from auto to manual to adjust flash or the specific mode I'd like to use. With a large enough memory card, this camera takes good video too. I just absolutely love this camera and would definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for travel
Reviews.Author: Barbara K. Wright
Reviews.Content: This little camera did the job in Africa.  I didn't want to carry my big boy camera and lens so I bought this little camera which produced fantastic photos.  Very impressive results.  The camera slipped into any pocket easily.  I chose the color to be able to identify the camera more easily if lost in a crowd.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Talitha Davis
Reviews.Content: Great quality! Lots of effect choices, fairly cheap and pretty durable. I've bought this before and when my old one died I just hass to get another. Great camera for hobbiest.

Reviews.Title: An nice little product!
Reviews.Author: Pelaro
Reviews.Content: I bought it as an all purpose camera for my girlfriend, and the quality of photos between macro and 30 feet is superb. While it lacks a powerful zoom, for what it does the photo quality equals or exceeds any similar sized pocket zoom I own.  My girl uses it to the exclusion of her big sx50; it has convinced her that having a small high quality camera you actually use is a far better choice than a big superzoom sitting in your closet!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Amy Erickson "ksuamy20"
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes some really sharp photos. My husband and I have had a lot of fun playing with the special effects as well. Super Slow Motion movie has been a huge time-waster for us. This camera is small enough to fit in a purse or in cargo shorts (even while in a case) so we take it almost everywhere we go.If you don't care about the color, you can get a pretty good deal on this camera. I've seen some as low as $89 so if you're not picky about color and don't mind waiting for the price to change, you can get this camera for cheap. We bought it for $129, and I think it was a good buy. My husband gets asked a lot "What kind of camera do you use?" because the photos look so nice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Matilda Jamison
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera for my granddaughter and she absolutely loves it.Takes great pictures.the videos are amazing.She loves the blue color.

Reviews.Title: Point click and done!
Reviews.Author: AOzzy
Reviews.Content: The perfect thing about this camera is how fast it takes to get the next shot. You don't have to hold done the picture button very long and it's already for another shot. It auto focus and auto light. I'm not very camera savvy and this one is perfect for me. The video is great too.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: U, Fox
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Very sturdy and very nice size. Smaller than a pack of cigarettes. Easily slips into your pocket.Great display and a very easy to follow menu.  I have owned it for a year and a half and the battery is still charging well..battery life is very good. Excellent snapshot camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH
Reviews.Author: Carrie Danforth "carrie"
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Takes beautiful, crisp, clear pictures.  Viewing screen is large which works really well for my mom.  Very easy to use and lightweight.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Replacement
Reviews.Author: Wayne Maier
Reviews.Content: Our grandson pushed the extended lens back in with his hand causing a lens error. This purchase was a replacement. We like this camera and find it easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Takes beautiful photos.
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer, but this camera makes it easy for those of us who prefer the point-and-shoot style of cameras.  The battery has a long life and transferring the photos to the computer is very easy.  The screen is large and allows you to review the pictures immediately.  Definitely was a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love my camera
Reviews.Author: LisaK
Reviews.Content: I got this as a birthday gift from my husband and I love it. I had an older ELPH and this was just an upgrade. Easy to use right out of the box, takes great photos, hold a lot of pics as well. It was a great price so defiintely easy on the wallet. I use it to take family photos and this works just perfectly for me. I have a 4 year old and he has dropped it a few times and it still works great. I love Canons and this is no exception. Great little lightweight camera fits into my pocket and all I have to do it point and shoot. Easy peasy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Traci Childs
Reviews.Content: I love this camera - not only does it have a ton of amazing features, but it's also compact and easy to use/figure out.I use it in daily life as well as during my travels. Easily fits into my pocket and takes quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot and more camera
Reviews.Author: kmr
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for!  Great pictures.Only downside is the complex menu structure.  Wish they had a 'favorites' feature so I could easily get to the handful of modes I use.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Waldron
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera for the price and the blue is really cool!  It was shipped very quickly which was a bonus!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: nck
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, Canon is excellent.  The screen in the back is nice and big.I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: awful customer service
Reviews.Author: kit-kat
Reviews.Content: I am not very happy with the customer service with cannon . I bought the cannon power shot elph100hs to take pictures at my sons wedding it worked fine than I put it away for a few months took it out played with it here and there . The lens was getting stuck so it was only a year old .When I bought it I paid 199.00 . Sent it to the company they wanted me to pay 140.00 to fix it .I thought that was awful wont buy a cannon ever again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Point & Shoot!
Reviews.Author: MaryPDX97
Reviews.Content: This tiny camera is perfect for my needs! I did a lot of research before buying. I just a wanted a point & shoot camera to take pictures of my son. I really love that this camera has a switch to choose between 'auto' or selecting the settings. There's no wheel to turn or complicated menus to navigate when I want to snap a quick picture.  There's a dedicated button for the 1080p video. Plus, it's rare to find a camera at this price that has full 1080p HD video. I'm not sure why others have said you can't zoom using the video -- I use the zoom shooting video all the time!When I do slide the switch over to the custom settings menu, there're some really fun settings. My favorite  is a color accent option - it takes a black & white photo except for things that are 1 particular color that you choose. I really loved taking pictures of my son with just his blue eyes in color. I also love the "detect a smile' option - you don't have to push the button at just the right moment; you choose this option & aim - the camera takes the pic when a smile is detected. There are too many more great functions to go into detail. I recommend going to Cannon's website & looking over the online manual so you can decide for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS digital Camerawith 4X Optical
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Have had the camera a little while  and absolutely love it. Pictures are fantastic! It travels well as it fits in a pocket of slacks. Took a short time for me understand and feel comfortable with all the things it can do. Great product!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera but didnt stand the test of time.
Reviews.Author: T. Clark
Reviews.Content: I have had 3 Powershot elph series cameras.  I admit I am probably a little hard on them, but this one in particular gave out prematurely.  Basically to summarize, it takes beautiful pictures and video, easy to work, great features.My problem occurred with long term use of the wrist strap.  I would usually carry it on my wrist while walking.  I used it for about a year, maybe 3000 photos, before there was an incident.One day while walking with the camera on my wrist, dangling from the wrist strap, the plastic frame where the strap was attached gave out/broke which dropped the camera and made it non functional.I bought the next model, the 115 HS which seems to have fixed the faulty plastic piece.Not saying this will happen to everyone, if you can get it for a deal then I would buy but use caution with the strap!

Reviews.Title: Damaged
Reviews.Author: Brianna
Reviews.Content: The camera itself takes fine pictures, but the buttons used to select the shooting menus are damaged.  All buttons work as if they were the 'right' arrow button!I am highly disappointed in my order!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS
Reviews.Author: Nicole S. Clark
Reviews.Content: This is a Great camera, perfectly clear pictures, has a nice large screen, and of course, is beautiful in blue!

Reviews.Title: After Initial Set up, A Great Camera, Wonderful Product
Reviews.Author: M. Gehret "G-Man  Colorado"
Reviews.Content: Canon is THE brand that brings consistancy and professionally made products. This is no exception. The Elph 100 HS is yet another home run.  Great design, large LCD screen, good video (and stills) comes with a nice variety of settings for the individual to chose from.The LCD screen is bright, crisp and large, interestingly the slow motion capture and playback is unique but does darken ONLY during filming, not playback. The body of the camera is well built and some complain of the small buttons but its good for those who do not want to convert to the touch only screen option of other cameras out there. Using your fingernail to select navigation, may solve the issue of small tight buttons. Canon is a great innovator that continues to provide quality and professional feel and end results. Impresive for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: South FL living
Reviews.Content: Nice pictures. Easy to use. Doesn't take sports shots well and won't take multiple images in a row. Great for my daughter though. Great portability

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom (Grey)
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L. Halley
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It does so many things but the best feature for me is the low light setting.

Reviews.Title: Remember Your Late Night Mistakes!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Are you ever out dancing at a club in Miami, surrounded by attractive men who would love to take you home? Do you have that reliable friend who likes to photograph your mistakes and makes you and said mistake pose for a picture? Does your friend's camera ever take what seems like an eternity to take the shot because it was probably one of the original digital cameras or something cheap in the early 2000s and she just hasn't upgraded yet because she can't afford to take pictures of you like she's the paparazzi?Let's introduced this cheap replace, perfect for indulging your friend as she captures every. single. moment. and mistake. or amazing conquest! without the long wait. This camera snaps 'em out quicker than you can say "Aunt Jemima is amazing pancake syrup!"Glad I purchased this for her. And so is she.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: jailyn carrasquel
Reviews.Content: I receive my camara faster and in excellent conditionsthanks for everythingI recomend it sincerelythe only problem is that the color I receive it wasn't that a choose, but does not bother mebye

Reviews.Title: Solid Camera
Reviews.Author: Charles B. Bowen
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of pictures at work.  I don't need high quality pics, but I do need a durable camera.  This is the 3rd in the ELPH series that I have owned and it is very solid and durable as were the others.  The photo quality is similar to any other point and shoot that I have used over the years.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Detoll
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for 6 months.  I read such great reviews for this camera, so I thought it would be a good fit for me.  I am very disappointed with the camera's performance.  My pictures are not sharp and the flash seems to wash out people's faces.  I previously had a Fugi camera and that took way better pictures than this Cannon.  I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: john a mody
Reviews.Content: too much time between pressing the shutter  button and when the shutter goes off.Subject has moved bly then and I don't capture the original expression.

Reviews.Title: CanonPowershot
Reviews.Author: Kiwi
Reviews.Content: For the price, easy of use, and for quick shots when you are travelling this camera is ideal. Toss one in your carry on!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Purchased for our 13 year old daughter.  Easy to use and takes great pictures.  Over a year of use and she hasn't broken it yet and that is saying something!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Wilma F Hollon
Reviews.Content: Love my camera and use it all the time.  Sorry I did not review earlier.  Delivery was prompt and the item was just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera
Reviews.Author: LC743
Reviews.Content: I got this same camera a few months earlier and had been using it and loving it. It takes really clear pictures, even in low light. I'm no where near being a photography pro but with this camera and its settings (such as light metering and white balance) have allowed me to take beautiful pictures, bringing out vibrant colors and clarity even on cloudy, foggy days. Extreme weather conditions unfortunately ruined that camera on a recent trip and thankfully I had my iphone to satisfy my picture taking needs on the rest of my trip, and while that device definitely takes great pictures I realized that this camera is a big step up from the very basic capabilities of the iphone camera. Because I missed my camera so much I got the same one to replace it, so now I will be extremely careful with the new one so that I can continue to use this great camera as long as possible!

Reviews.Title: Good Pictures
Reviews.Author: JZ
Reviews.Content: Camera takes good pictures and is easy to use. Pretty much point and shoot. Screen is a touch larger than other models which makes it nice.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Gregory S-S
Reviews.Content: Bought this about 6 months ago for my 15 year old daughter and she loves it. She has taken hundreds if not thousands of pictures and videos and the quality is pretty good. Would recommend to anyone seeking a solid well put together point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera to carry everywhere!
Reviews.Author: Jean B
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It's small enough to keep in my purse, so I take it out whenever I see something interesting.  The battery can be charged over and over and lasts for a couple of hundred pictures.  I like the large viewing screen.  I haven't figured out all of the menu choices yet, but I'm very happy with what I can do easily.  If I ever learn about all of the other capabilities, the awesomeness of this little camera will be even more amazing.

Reviews.Title: Canon almost always delivers when it comes to digital cameras
Reviews.Author: Jeannine
Reviews.Content: I like the camera. You can never go wrong with Canon. Good product in a small package. Perfect for a beginner like myself

Reviews.Title: My Mom LOVES this camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Kurz "J. Q. Public"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my Mother as a gift.  Her old camera was only 2.2MP.  She has really taken to this camera.  She's taking lots of pictures and really enjoying the camera.  I don't know anything about the specs for this camera other than the 12.1MP CMOS is a great feature.  Images turn out very nicely.  Great point and shoot camera with some advanced features as well.I would recommend this camera to anyone who just wants to be able to take good pictures without having to change any settings or know anything about photography.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend for general use.
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: The compact size of this camera is perfect for on-the-go picture taking.  It's easy to use and takes decent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 100 HS
Reviews.Author: Mat
Reviews.Content: A great camera, best one I have had yet. Good for both point to shoot and Ebay pictures. Did not come with a memory card which I found to be a disappointment as I had to run to Wallmart to get one to start shooting. While I was there I found the same camera with card for less than I bought online so be advised.

Reviews.Title: A very nice and simple camera the delivers great images
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for the point and shoot person. It's very easy to figure out the settings and it works very well in little light situations.

Reviews.Title: A great little camera
Reviews.Author: Robert G. Fink
Reviews.Content: This small camera takes great clear  pictures.  It's easy to use and small enough to Carry in your shirt pocket.RGF

Reviews.Title: Great camera, recommend to anyone not looking to be a prof. photographer
Reviews.Author: austin83339
Reviews.Content: great camera takes great pictures, also takes nice videos in hd. Would recommend this camera to anyone not looking to buy a DSLR. This was for my wife who has a Canon D60 and wanted something more compact that she could carry in here purse for everyday photos and absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Best darn camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. K. E. Patrick
Reviews.Content: This is the third one of these I've bought.  The first one got caught in a rainstorm and died from being wet, so when it came time to replace it, I bought exactly the same model even though a newer model had come out. Then when my son wanted one for Christmas, I paid a bit more than his usual budget to get him a camera I knew I could trust (having bought my daughter a cheaper model in the past that just wasn't worth it). The best feature on it is the low-light setting, which allows really nice indoor pictures without flash.  There's also a program setting that allows for fill-in flash, and all the usual features like timers, night-time, automatic, and such-like.

Reviews.Title: nice gift
Reviews.Author: "M"
Reviews.Content: i got this camera as a gift for my birthday last year.i've always had canon cameras and love them cus they never fail on me and they take beaufitul photos...this is no exception, specially for the price, i thought the quality wasnt going to be very good but it turned out better than expected.easy to use and small, i can carry it in my purse or give it to my friends to carry it on their pockets. super cute. im a girl so i love it, and i know this camera comes in different colors so, totally worth the buy if you want something thats cheap and easy, and most importantly, that takes good queality photos.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Caddyman
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a replacement for another ELPH digital camera which my wife " borrowed" (permanently).  It is intuitive to use, and takes great pictures in the fully automatic mode, almost as good as my Sony professional model digital, which was vastly more expensive, much heavier and bulky, and vastly more cumbersome to use.  This camera fits nicely in a clip-on cell phone case, so it is very easy to carry around.  The Canon battery has a long use life between charges.  The LED screen is easy to see (except in extremely bright, direct sunlight) and shows a clear image.  Controls are simple and well thought out.  Zoom feature works well for what it does, but is not extremely powerful.  If you want an easy to use, easy to carry, point and shoot camera which takes excellent pictures, this is a good one to pick.

Reviews.Title: Liked it!
Reviews.Author: R J
Reviews.Content: Pictures captured are good but videos recorded are even better. Nice color and pretty sleek. I'd definitely recommend this model.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4X optical zoom
Reviews.Author: amazon aficionado
Reviews.Content: I like the compact size of the camera.  I got a small camera bag and can wear it on my belt.  I like the quality of the photos and the length of life of the battery.  However, It is difficult to learn how to use the camera due to the sparse instructions.  It would help to have a diagram with labels for each part of the camera, so that when the instructions name a lever or button to use, it would be possible to easily locate the correct button or lever.  I did figure out where the zoom lever is located, but that was a challenge!  I have used the camera for almost a month, but I have not yet learned to use many of its features.

Reviews.Title: Very pixelated
Reviews.Author: CBear82
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as just something small to tote around. Its not bad for what it is, but I feel like it was over priced. I usually love Canon but this has a very low pixel resolution.

Reviews.Title: Perfect point-and-shoot camera for non-techncally oriented
Reviews.Author: M. Lam
Reviews.Content: Got it for my mother since she needed a new camera. She uses it with no problem. Nice color and auto-settings. No problems so far. Takes great pictures - I think my next camera will be a Canon PowerShot ELPH as well.

Reviews.Title: Second ELPH 100
Reviews.Author: Joni K
Reviews.Content: This is my second Canon ELPH 100.  The first I had about two years and dropped.  One does not want to drop a camera.  It still worked but the lens didn't move.  I tried my friends who has a ELPH 310, and another with a 110, but the 100 does everything I want it to do, is easy to use, and takes superb pictures.  I print some pictures on a HP printer and they are great.  Others I have developed at a local warehouse store and they are excellent.  Those I send via e-mail are tops too.  I cannot recommend this camera highly enough.  It goes everywhere with me - but don't drop it on the lens as any camera will not function properly/I sent the camera in to Canon with little hope they would fix it.  Not only did they send me a replacement but did so withing 7 days.  I would highly recommend this camera as it takes remarkable pictures, great little movies, and has a number of specialized functions.  It is amazing to have a repair service that will actually stand behind the warranty and repair or replace a defective camera.  I have an no trouble with the camera other than that.  It is a supurb camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Maria L. Nagy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a present for my son, along with a great case of the same color.My son is extremely satisfied with the camera and all of the features it has. And of course, the quality of the photos is really good.

Reviews.Title: Elph 100HS
Reviews.Author: J. A. "Jessi"
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive little camera. Not as compact as the other Powershots but packs the same features. Bought 2 and they have held up well.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL65
Reviews.Content: I am really pleased with this little camera, It is very user friendly and takes great pictures in day or night. I  have been using Kodaks all my life but always had problems with the Kodaks ability to take night shots,The other night we had a couple of friends over for dinner,as they were leaving we noticed a rare full moon with a huge halo around it.We all wanted to get a picture so I ran inside to get my Kodak, My friends had this Cannon ELPH and started taking pictures, Every picture they took looked great and clearly showed the halo around the moon. My Kodak was a different story,It had some trouble focusing on the moon and when it did take the picture it was grainy with no visable halo , I tried my 2 other Kodaks with the same crappy results. Thats when I decided to purchase this Cannon ELPH from Amazon at a great price. I love it.!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: chasinokie
Reviews.Content: it survived Hawaii and that is something to say for me and a camera used it for water pics and wet use at Niagara Falls

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture Quality!
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my wife. Chose this over other pocket point and shoot cameras because at the time it was the only one with a CMOS sensor instead of the standard CCD sensor. The CMOS sensor is the kind commonly found in DSLR cameras (the big cameras that photographers use). Because of this sensor it easily takes pictures nicer than many 14 and even 16 megapixel cameras. The optical zoom may not be much, but don't worry. Just make sure your subject is in the frame. Then zoom in or blow up the photo after it has been taken. You will be surprised how clear the image comes out.Other great features include a switch on the top to quickly flip between auto and custom settings for scene, white balance, iso speed and other such settings. Another added bonus is the video recording button. No need to switch to video mode, just push the record button and the camera does the rest. The sound recorded during video is okay as it is mono due to only a single microphone, but the picture quality of the video is excellent.Its small size makes it easy to slip into a pocket, though my wife typically carries it in her purse.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Bridget
Reviews.Content: I only buy Canon camera.  It works great.  It zooms in a lot and shows you if you are zooming in too much, that the quality might be compromised.  Video works great too.  It takes the standard card reader.  The battery is a little bigger than my last canon camera, which I find frustrating, because you can't use the same charger.

Reviews.Title: Good product for a decent price
Reviews.Author: Prudhvi kamal K
Reviews.Content: The camera picture quality is good and so is the ease of use and is very simple. Not many features but decent enough for a travel. Fits well into your pockets. Only problem is the flip flash which is sometimes problematic but we cannot complaint about it.

Reviews.Title: For the price, great camera...
Reviews.Author: nora rose
Reviews.Content: But compared to others, not so great.Basically, I'm difficult with electronics aka I have a bad habit of throwing them to the ground. And breaking them. Within a year. So I bought this Canon because it was under $100 with decent reviews. It has lasted almost a year with no problems. I also have a problem with "blurry mode" or low-light focusing. This camera (in auto mode) does a decent job of focusing but still 25% of my shots (even with flash) don't focus properly if you're taking several in succession. If you're out at night, you need to remember to focus before you shoot and check to see if it is blurry. Still I'm very happy that it can also focus in low light once you take the time.

Reviews.Title: Good. Not great.
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Good point and shoot. I bought it after my last Canon was stolen and I have to say, even though that one was about six years old, I think I liked it more. The auto features on this one just don't always work well. They make the lighting look weird.

Reviews.Title: dissappointing little camera
Reviews.Author: GregCV
Reviews.Content: It takes a secret formula of button pushing to accomplish anything, and I had to spend hours trying to learn it with the manual, which is very poorly written, using jargon and special descriptions only a Canon engineer could imagine.  Maybe it is this camera tries to do too much for just a little camera.  I just want to take pictures and put them on my computer, but the functions slide over to making movies (usually of my feet) and another hour or so trying to figure out how to return to just taking pictures. I wanted a camera simple and easy to use, and this ain't it.  I will try to find the right one for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dr. Larry
Reviews.Content: This camera was great while on a three week trip through Europe. The camera takes great pictures and the battery life was outstanding. I was able to take hundreds of pictures each day without re-charging it. Easy to use, with great photos.

Reviews.Title: Warning - Lense is not dust tight
Reviews.Author: Don65
Reviews.Content: The Elph 100HS is my fourth Elph series camera and is the worst of the bunch. In less than a year, dust began to enter the lens system making black spots on the photos.  The spots are particularly noticeable when the lens system is maximally zoomed - they come into focus at that point.  As you go to a more wide angle shot, the spots become more diffuse and almost disappear when the lens is minimally zoomed.  I now have ten distinct spots on all photos taken with the lens in full telephoto position. No amount of cleaning on the exterior of the lens will remove the spots - the dust is inside the lens system.I would avoid all of the cameras in the HS series - they all appear to use the same lens assembly.I think the camera has to go.  I have been a faithful Canon customer for many years but I will try another brand next time.

Reviews.Title: "Lens Error" happened after about 7 months; free replacement camera showed same error after 7 months
Reviews.Author: DGJerz "jerzdg"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera... I hadn't bought a new camera since 2005, so I was really shocked at how much better the imaging has gotten. About three weeks ago, I started getting the "Lens Error" and the lens wouldn't always retract right away. I'm fortunate in that I had access to other cameras, so when this one choked up I wasn't completely lost. I shipped it back to Canon, and in about a week I had a replacement in my hands. Of course, I'm worried the lens error will happen again, and will they keep replacing the camera forever?  That's why I can't give the camera 5 stars. If I had to do it over again, I would have paid more for a different camera, but that's only because, armed with this really good camera, I started dong some more serious video work, so I really missed this camera's quality when it broke. I hope my replacement lasts longer than the original. UPDATE: about 7 months after the free replacement arrived from Canon, it showed the "lens error" and locked up. What was a 4-star review is now 1.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot digital camera ELPH 100
Reviews.Author: Jeff L
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Had one for years, then the lens had a retractor problem.  Immediately went out and bought another. Excellent photos every time. For the price I have found no camera better.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: K. Johnston "KJ2002"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera. I looked for a while and settled on this one and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes great pictures for the money. I highly recommend this camera to anyone who needs a dependable and easy pocket camera. Fits nicely in ones shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Darryl Coan
Reviews.Content: the best point and shoot camera I've ever owned. The battery last a long time, and it's easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH 100 HS
Reviews.Author: mossmoss
Reviews.Content: Generally very happy with the camera, even the software that came with it.  The only weaknesses that I have found out is that the battery does not last a long time and that the cover for the power and HDMI connector stopped closing completely.  Bought a spare battery and charger and the other is a get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Good!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Marcinha
Reviews.Content: I received when they told me I was supposed to be receiving. Satisfied with it and I will buy more!

Reviews.Title: Purchased twice
Reviews.Author: W. Cornett
Reviews.Content: We bought one of these Elph 100 HS cameras at Wal-mart about a year ago for my wife. It suffered a fatal dive from a moving golf cart so we decided to order another from Amazon since the first one took such good photos and she was used to it's operation. The second one works as good as the first but we bought it at a lower price because the updated model for this year has more megapixels. Whoopee. I lost interest in the megapixel race at about 8MP. What's important is the camera's ability to focus and expose the image properly and the speed of startup. The Elph 100HS is good on those points and gives clear and well exposed images. It has plenty of zoom range for normal use. There's always a tradeoff when buying a camera with a lens over 4x. The long zooms don't gather light as well in low light conditions and long zooms add weight and size. The 100HS lacks some advanced features of more expensive cameras like continuous shooting mode but for average picture taking it's a steal at the current price. HD video works well also, the lens just won't zoom during the video but that's not a problem for us.

Reviews.Title: value for money
Reviews.Author: Prashanth Chintapalli
Reviews.Content: cameras from this segment are really trying to cater to all those people without an iphone or an SLR. Buy it only if you belong to that category. Picture clarity is great. I bought it for my parents who are 60+ and they seem to be very comfortable clicking pictures.

Reviews.Title: Cannot withstand a 1 foot drop to a soft floor
Reviews.Author: L. Head "techiewannabe"
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera and it's functions, and it took good photos. About one week after use, the camera dropped from a low standing chair to a wooden deck. Thinking not much about it, I went to charge up the battery, and to my shock, the LCD was a horrible mess. It was not cracked (not even a scratch) but the LCD has lines and black-outs, all over it. The camera is still functional, but we cannot see the images.I have dropped ipods, cell phones, other cameras from a much higher height, and to a much harder surface (the road) and the only resulting damamge was a scratch or dent. This camera cannot withstand the softest of drops. It's made of cheap plastic, and I just cannot believe how fragile it is. I would never buy a Canon again - money down the drain!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: K. Garrett
Reviews.Content: This camera takes awesome, sharp, crisp, clear pictures. I was actually a little surprised at how beautiful my pictures came out given how affordable this camera is.For an inexperienced camera user like myself, the auto setting is AMAZING and so helpful. I only wish this camera hand a wrist strap because I'm a little clumsy and I've been petrified that I'm going to drop it and break it.Also, this camera (like a lot of others) doesn't come with a memory card and won't operate without one, so I suggest that while you're waiting for it to be delivered you run out and buy a SD or SDHC card so you can use your camera as soon as it arrives!Hope this helped.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Hernandez
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal on this camera. It's a nice point and shoot with some more advanced options. I've had it for almost a year without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 100 impresses
Reviews.Author: TrIndie Publishing "'Bridging the Gap'"
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on a trip with me to San Francisco a couple of days after i got the camera. I hadn't used it prior to that. I am very impressed by the pictures it took and equally impressed with this seller's quick shipping. I did not pay for expedited shopping, but i got the package in a couple of days from ordering. For the price, you can't beat this tiny, handy camera. Canon has always made a great little digital camera so it doesn't shock me, but for the money...great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Crazy Shopper
Reviews.Content: Good Camera works good without any issues. Photos come good and battery is good too.Zoom, flash and different modes of image works fine too

Reviews.Title: Wonderful digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Marilyn B. Schanck "Sun worshiper"
Reviews.Content: My 1st camera was a Minolta & it got stolen from hotel room. Picked Canon as my son had one which I Had to borrow for vacation in Europe. Loved it so much decided to stick with a Canon. Over 4000 pics & videos taken. Videos & pics are great. Me a SENIOR so needed camera i could figure out.

Reviews.Title: Great when it works.
Reviews.Author: Texan Cowboy
Reviews.Content: Takes pretty decent photos when the darn thing opens up. Sometimes it gets stuck right when I'm taking a picture. I haven't had it for more than a year! Aggravating. Cannon is starting to let me down.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Dianne J. Reitz "Lady Di kitchen queen"
Reviews.Content: this camera is perfect for the point and shoot photographer, easy to use,great pictures, small. Perfect for young or old, experienced or not.

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Gregg Alison Suchow
Reviews.Content: I've had other powershots before and this one is no different than the rest...it's easy to work, gorgeous blue color, and great pictures! it's as easy as point and shoot!

Reviews.Title: An amazing piece of engineering.
Reviews.Author: CRITIC 823
Reviews.Content: I researced this camera and ordered it through Amazon for $109.00. I was very surprised when I started using this camera. The camera has so many features that were missing from my previous cameras. I recently  video taped my Grandaughter's first communion and it turned out great. But, when I tried to transfer the video to disk using the included Zoombrowser 6.5, I found it did not recognize a dvd format. I did get the movie recorded to dvd through my recorder but extra information was recorded along the perimeters. If anyone else has had this problem and found a solution, I would appreciate a response.

Reviews.Title: canon powershot elph 100 hs
Reviews.Author: baste boy "pinoy"
Reviews.Content: I just received my camera today and as described looks like new but used with minor scratches on the bottom, I have to say I do have a brand new one right now and had to buy another one because my son loved the way this camera functions.  The pictures under low lighting is amazing compared to his casio ex z150 point and shoot camera.  Even researched comparing to other point and shoot cameras worth 2-300 dollars, this have a better rating with lower megapixels.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Mom
Reviews.Author: Ms. Jag99
Reviews.Content: I wanted something easy to use, compact, and cute for my mother.  I have one of the earlier versions and like it so this was it.  She was sending me pictures the next day.  She could not be happier.Amazon never lets me down it is my favorite store.

Reviews.Title: Lens Error
Reviews.Author: A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I got this camera the end of January and I absolutely loved it!  I was very careful with it and never dropped it or left it where my boys could get it.  I was searching through the color features one day and when I turned it off, the lens would not retract and when I turned it back on, it would have a lens error and shut back off.  I contacted Canon and they said I would have to send it in to get it fixed.  I have little boys and a new baby and I am upset that I am missing important shots because my camera stopped working for no reason.  Really disappointed.  I just hope Canon will fix it under the warranty and I won't have to pay more money...

Reviews.Title: A very good camera
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: This camera works like the one I thought I had lost.  It is easy to use as an amateur.  The zoom is stronger than the first one I have.Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom (Blue) I picked this camera because I has such good result with my first one.  Now I have two cameras.  Both very good.One can just pick up the camera point and click.  The pictures are clear.  The videos have better sound than a recorder gets. This is small enough to fit into a purse or pocket easy to grab and snap.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Prior to buying the Canon ELPH 100HS camera, I returned a Nikon S3100 to Costco due to consistently blurry pictures.  That was an 'impulse buy' based on a great price.  After checking the reviews at Amazon, I could see why the price was so low.  There were lots of poor reviews on that particular camera for the same reason.  This camera is going to Europe with my daughter in a few months, so what good are 14M pixels if the pictures are not focused properly?I researched other point-and-shoot cameras on Amazon, and came up with the Canon ELPH 100HS as my next target. This time I carefully read the reviews and downloaded the owner's manual ahead of the purchase.  Yes, I paid a little more, but it was worth every penny.  The picture quality is so much better!  The images are consistently clear and well-focused.  The HS (high sensitivity) feature produces great shots at low light levels as well.  Some of the low light shots are even better than those of my own Canon S5 IS camera, although the S5 uses older technology.  I am thoroughly impressed with this model!  It even scrolls helpful hints at the bottom of the display, in case you can't remember what certain settings are used for.  You can turn off the hints if you prefer.  Read the owner's manual from the Canon website and you'll see the complete feature list.The 1080p full HD video is amazing as well.  I played back a video on my Vizio LCD TV using a mini HDMI cable (purchased separately) from the camera, and I was impressed.  The video was as detailed and smooth as any HD video that I've seen from a camcorder.  I used a class 10 32GB card, so that my daughter can capture over 5000 pictures or 1 hour of HD video when she tours Europe.  At least I know her pictures and videos will be great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kulak
Reviews.Content: Simply a great all around compact camera.  No complaints.  Even easy for my 9 and 11 year old kids to use!

Reviews.Title: A Good Performer!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D. Stubbs "JStubbs.com"
Reviews.Content: The ELPH 100 HS (in Europe the model seems to be named the IXUS 115 HS) is a pretty good performer, particularly when considering it's relatively low cost. I also own a Canon Rebel T2i. While the 100 HS gives the Rebel a run for its money, there is a distinct difference in performance between the two. The much more expensive Rebel is a better camera. However, it is significantly bigger and thus more to carry. When traveling, and not wanting to be branded as a tourist, the 100 HS is quite satisfactory. The smaller camera is also less likely to attract thieves. I suppose the 100 HS can take pictures suitable for publication; if managed carefully. I've used it for about three months with no problems. The last two weeks have been heavy use - over a thousand pictures. I've been downloading to a Mac Air and have found that the quality is reasonably close to a Rebel a friend was using. I also downloaded the Rebel's shots, many were of almost the same angle and subject - it was hard to tell the difference (a more skilled photographer than I would likely see the difference). To sum up my impressions: I'd buy this camera again, its performance has been quite satisfactory and I am willing to recommend it to my sensible friends.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a 6 year old Kodak EasyShare camera for a recent trip to China. There was nothing wrong with my old Kodak, it worked and took nice pictures. I never thought the bigger screen on this Canon would make a big difference but it does. In fact, everything about this camera blows my old one out of the water. The settings, the shutter speed, the picture quality. Everything you could ask for in a simple point & shoot. I took around 500 pictures during my week in Beijing and Shanghai and every single one is fantastic. Even the hand-held night setting took awesome pictures through a hotel window. My pictures totally trump every picture my friends took with their cameras and our iPhones.

Reviews.Title: small but mighty
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd Canon digital camera I've owned.  First one was great, but this one is even better.  Sharp images, lots of options (night-time scenes, fireworks, snow, beach, etc.)  Takes great videos, too.  For the money, a super value.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Kiki
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  I bought this for my 12yr old daughter, very easy to use and download pics! She loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Cannon ELPH
Reviews.Author: Carolyn
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  It's small enough to fit into a pocket and easy to use.  The clarity of the pictures is very good.

Reviews.Title: POCKET SIZED WONDER
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Clark
Reviews.Content: Sweet little pocket sized wonder does it all excellently.Only con is it could have come boxed, with a memory card.In other words buying a camera in a box, it should containall that is necessary to start using it.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for a CMOS Imager ELPH
Reviews.Author: Paul C
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about 4 month now. I really like - image quality is great for what I'm shooting, it's smaller than the previous cameras (other ELPHs, Samsung, and Nikons), and has an excellent price point. The viewscreen is large enough and brieght enough for using it in direct sunlight. I also bought the Canon underwater housing for this camera and have been very impressed with the underwater images and videos it took. if I lost this camera today, i would immediately buy another identical camera to replace it. I'm that happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Its Good For the Price, im satisfied.
Reviews.Author: CyberTechGuy
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera with wonderful hd capability.Only thing i dislike is that it cant focus or zoom in will recording.But overall its a great camera.For i alittle bit more money i think a better choice would be the Canon ELPH 300 HS

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: J. Baker
Reviews.Content: This guy takes great pictures for such a small camera. I love the color. I think it has an excellent lens

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY CANON POWERSHOT ELPH 100 HS
Reviews.Author: Beverly O
Reviews.Content: I love my Canon PowerShot ELPH 100 HS.  My daughter just had her first baby and I LOVE LOVE LOVE the High Speed Burst setting.  It is a must have to capture the babys movements and facial expressions.  The video setting is awesome as well.  I shot a video of my cousins sledding a few weeks ago and it turned out great.  I would highly recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a small camera that has alot of features.

Reviews.Title: Soft and noisy - but I like the features
Reviews.Author: Leslie "BookGroupBooks"
Reviews.Content: I'm going to keep this camera because one has to take into consideration the ease of use and the price.  My other camera is a Sony TX1 - also a subcompact, but twice the price.  Nonetheless, I would have expected the Canon to have better images than the Sony because (1) the Sony uses folded optics and (2) the Canon is 12 megapixels vs. 10 on the Sony and (3) the Elph 100 is newer technology.To my surprise, in side-by-side comparison, the images from the TX1 were less noisy, and more detailed.Keep in mind, you would only notice this if you greatly enlarged the photos. Otherwise, colors, exposures, response time, etc. were all very good on the Canon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Ally
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! So easy to use, pictures are clear and the viewing screen on the back of the camera is nice and big. The shipping was fast (and FREE!). I highly recommend ordering through Amazon.. I think they really stand behind their products!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: choey
Reviews.Content: Works well, feels good, nice pictures.  Simple, easy to use, basic camera for the right price.  Nothing fancy just quick, easy, clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for price
Reviews.Author: E. Flower "pet lover"
Reviews.Content: Nice features, easy to use. Not as clear a picture as I would like but for the price it does a good job. Small easy to tuck into your pocket book. Indoor pictures with flash a little grainy

Reviews.Title: Canon never fails
Reviews.Author: DAZdesign
Reviews.Content: As most of Canon cameras this one does not disappoint you. For the price you are getting the best there is there. The picture quality is very good and settings are easy to control. Highly recommend for your vacation pictures. Small, fits in your pocket.I would give it 5 stars but I just never do - there is always room for improvement.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great quality
Reviews.Author: DEANNA
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  I bought for my daughter for Christmas, she's expecting her first child. Has a very large LCD screen, love that!

Reviews.Title: Works Great, video is outstanding
Reviews.Author: Lloyd White
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need it to, and the video is great. The features for this camera beat every camera in its price range, and it works great in low light which was a problem with my previous digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures
Reviews.Author: S. Meldrum "tree farmer"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes really amazing pictures, it's sturdy and easy to handle.  It has a lot of different functions and features that I didn't realize it had. I really like this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cherie
Reviews.Content: Great compact camera.  Easy to use.  Pictures turn out great.  Super to carry every day in case you have a 'Canon' moment.  I would highly recommend the purchase, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Pictures: A+ ... even HD Video A+!!  See review for sample video
Reviews.Author: Lee Hudson "ScribbleSongs"
Reviews.Content: I have had owned a PowerShot camera for years...started with a 4MP model, and have had three along the way.  I love how absolutely point and shoot they are, and the pictures are such top quality.  This latest purchase of mine, the 100HS, is my favorite by far.  It boots up super quickly, pictures are perfect every time (though sometimes I notice a little blur if I don't do the half-push, then full push on the shutter button).  I even took video with this camera and was blown away by the quality.  I totally am ditching my DV camcorder in favor of using only this for the future.  Gorgeous color to the video.  You can see a sample I shot here:[...](if the voting is over for this contest, you can view the video here: [...])I did a video as an entry to a B&H; Unboxing contest (trying to win ANOTHER camera from Canon).  You'll see that the video captures amazing color and has a great picture.  While you're there, I could totally use your vote (if it's before Jan 23, 2012)!  If not, take a look at the video anyway.  It shows off the reason I truly love this camera.In the interest of full disclosure, the opening scenes that were shot on the beach were taken with a GoPro camera due to the sand and water.  But from then on it was ONLY the Canon.  Just my two cents' worth :).Lee

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal little camera
Reviews.Author: A. Smith "DIY-MAX"
Reviews.Content: Great camera. My mom just loves it. Too bad I did not have the idea to get this for her years ago. Amazon shipping was great as usual.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 100 Review
Reviews.Author: KiloEchoNovember
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my mother for Christmas. She is very pleased with this camera. She claims it's easy to use, it was easy to learn the features and her photos have been excellent especially considering the price of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: R. Rollins
Reviews.Content: This has been a great camera for the price. It takes great pictures and is very quick. The battery life has been awesome. We have been very happy with the low light pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Elph 100 HS from Amazon
Reviews.Author: gary h
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and makes nice photos; is compact and light, yet very capable. It came ahead of time and was exactly what I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for it's price
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to replace our Sony camera that broke after our son played with it. This is a really nice camera and takes good pictures. We are very satisfied with the purchase. The shipping was also fast, we got the camera in time for Christmas.. so we didn't miss any moment.

Reviews.Title: Best camera on the market
Reviews.Author: eshdawg36
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an upgrade to my old powershot and I love it!  Bigger screen, better battery, and user friendly, what's not to love.  I especially like how quickly it takes pictures to capture the moment.  I will probably upgrade again in a couple of years if canon keeps up with this great product.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm not camera expert, but I like to take great pics of my kids, pets, landscape,etc.  I had a Nikon Coolpix L20 and I actually disliked it from the get go, so this was bought to replace that.  It's smaller but packs a real punch, got it the day before Christmas Eve and took lots of Christmas pics w/ it.  Low light, high light, doesn't matter, I have it set to auto and it takes great pics.  I have yet to get into the other settings for it, as it was a pretty much load the memory(that it doesn't come w/ btw) and go for the whirlwind Christmas season. I LOVE it!  For the price it can't be beat.  I saw it at Target yesterday for $179.99 I paid MUCH less than that for it w/ an extra battery and an 8gb memory card.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: A great product. Just love it.
Reviews.Author: treelover88
Reviews.Content: Bought one and love it. Easy to use and take pretty good pictures. Then bought other two as gifts. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift, and it was a big hit. We used it at Disneyland the first day, and got great photos!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Bo Dean "Skier2007"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife for Christmas.  The photos are of high quality and combined with the superfast SD card we purchased, this camera takes photos in quick succession.  The video quality is decent, but the sound is so so.  If you need a video camera, but a video camera.  That aside, this is a great camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Thanks Amazon.
Reviews.Author: Lyn H.
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a gift for my daughter and she is very happy with it.  Cute, wonderful color and easy to use. Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great value purchase
Reviews.Author: e5ctswab
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great value purchase at this price.  The camera's features are considerably more than similar point-and-shoot cameras in this range.  We have had excellent results to date since purchasing this item (with an SD card and case).

Reviews.Title: Canon ELPH in Hot Pink
Reviews.Author: Julia's Child
Reviews.Content: I have purchased several Canon ELPH camera's for gifts over the last few years because I like them so much.  They are small and easy to operate.  This one has a large LCD screen.  It was purchased for Christmas for my Granddaughter who is 13. The picture quality in low light is wonderful and the advanced features will keep any budding photographer interested is trying new things.  The video in HD is excellent.  I purchased an 8G card for this camera. There is the ability to turn the flash off, which not all cameras have.  Each new version of the Canon ELPH gets better and better.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT CHOICE
Reviews.Author: Bill McLean "Is this worth the price?"
Reviews.Content: I got mine yesterday at Radio Shack ($109.95, sale ends today).  Ordinarily I get the best deals at Amazon - but I'm flexible.This little bitty camera is an excellent choice for an amateur photographer like me.  I just can't go any place without a camera.  I also own a Rebel t2i but I only use it when I go out for the soul purpose of making pictures.I must say that the ELPH 100 produces unexpectedly great results.  Not, of course, as great as my Rebel.  But in certain situations it actually is the better choice.  Any spy will agree.I find this ELPH to have mind boggling features for such a little camera.  I plan to leave it on "Intelligent Automatic" for quick shots.  I'll take advantage of the special features when time permits. (Shoot first and adjust setting later.)With great image quality, and great features, this is an excellent tiny camera - and it sells for a tiny price.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Doug Metcalfe
Reviews.Content: Very accurate , lightweight, and easy to use.  I did a lot of research before buying this one and I am glad I did.

Reviews.Title: LOVE. LOVE. and more LOVE.
Reviews.Author: danielle barnes
Reviews.Content: This camera is in short - LOVE.  It is pocket sized and quite amazing for being so small.I had to upgrade from my 7mega pixel Samsung, so I bought the Canon Powershot ELPH 100 to replace it.  And to be honest, I've had so much fun with this camera's features its ridiculous.it's a very basic point and shoot camera and has a very fast shutter.  No time lag hardly at all between shots with the flash, and is very handy for vacations and quick snapshots.  The best part is indeed the FANTASTIC quality of the pictures (I had a Nikon Coolpix 14 megapixel and this Canon surpasses it by far)  It takes great pictures in low light and doesn't produce blurry pictures.  Also, it chooses its setting if you allow it to (select the feature) and this makes it all the more fun.Overall, it's a GREAT buy.  Perfect for vacations and just a quick snap shot camera.  Personally, I'd get it just for all the choices of different settings (the fishbowl one is the best).

Reviews.Title: The new improved Canon Elph 100
Reviews.Author: James B. Conley
Reviews.Content: This is an evolutionary change in the basic Canon point-n-shoot digital camera - the sensor was upgraded from 3 to 12 mps (more than many digital SLR's have today) and it has High Def video capability as well - great product!

Reviews.Title: Everything we wanted!
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera to replace our Kodak Easy Share which took TERRIBLE photos! A family friend had a Canon similar to this that we'd been wanting for years. We purchased this model for the the features, specifically things like Color Accent and Fisheye Lens which we didn't have in our other camera. In addition- even a simple photo of nothing is far better quality than any other camera we've owned. Obviously, we're not well educated photographers, but I am confident that this camera will take great quality photos- for the quality, you can't beat the price! :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Z. Gelnett "prozach99"
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, but more importantly it boots up SUPER FAST as well as has a super fast shutter for taking shots.  If you want a very good camera without breaking your budget, look no further.

Reviews.Title: Hard to believe this costs so little
Reviews.Author: PhillyPilot
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews on amazon before making my purchase. I was so close to getting the 300 but the 100 is nearly identical at 40 plus cheaper. The quality of the photos I have been taking are outstanding! The video looks great too!!. Tons of features, all very easy to use and play with! For this price you can not go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Video
Reviews.Author: J. Latimer "br1"
Reviews.Content: Took this to Disney World and took pictures and videos. Love the ease of use and the picture and video quality. This is my 2nd Canon camera they really stand up to abuse.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Dave S
Reviews.Content: My wife needed an easy to use point and shoot camera for all occasions. After reading the reviews on Amazon I ordered it with high expectations. The camera lives up to its reviews. It is compact and yes the buttons on the back are small but these are the only faults I can find with this camera. The Auto mode works so well for most every shot with the picture quality as good as I could hope for. The Cannon software allows the camera to interface with your computer seamlessly. Like most other reviews if you are looking for a relatively low cost point and shoot camera you cannot go wrong with this Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Cuate
Reviews.Content: It's nice and wonderful.  Shipment was fast and the package condition was good too.The picture qualities is great and for the camera price it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Present I recieved
Reviews.Author: s.dancer
